name: Lake Facade: Director's Cut
description:
WELCOME TO LAKE FACADE!

You have arrived at the mysterious Lake Facade. A secluded tranquil spot, with some of the best fishing around!
Or so you've been told...

Enter Lake Facade and enjoy your stay or try to solve its mysteries.



Spend your time:
-Fishing 🎣
-Exploring the Lake 🗺️
-Talk to the locals 💬
-Uncover the history and secrets of the Lake 📜
-Become one with the Lake 🐙




A retro style puzzle/adventure game about fishing, exploring and uncovering ancient horrors.
Heavily inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and other Lovecraftian mythos, blending elements into both the gameplay and story (Not just a Cthulhu squid monster).

Open ended gameplay lets you choose how you want to progress with multiple endings.
But the end is just the beginning...

Your actions leave a permanent effect on this world.
Are you sure that's what you really want?



This is the full version of Lake Facade. The original was made in 10 days for the DreadXP Dredge the Depths Jam, available here: https://rexoto.itch.io/lakefacade
